title: Circus-y, turn-of-the-century display face a la Emigre's Brothers
content:
Except with a weird R, notably

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203235600im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/fridgedoor_1980_35810079_6373.jpeg)

 [‹ Ted Baker showing some style](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203235600/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40969 "Go to previous forum topic") [Fonts that show their construction ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203235600/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40946 "Go to next forum topic")
author: roquestrew

comments.content: Slightly related [query](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203235600/http:/typophile.com/node/40841), featuring a sans serif face with a weird “K.”
Thanks Ricardo; I’d actually commented on that thread! I’d love to know both
